tool_description: Evaluates violations against suspension policies to determine appropriate actions and suspension parameters.

violation_data.description: JSON string containing violation details and evidence

account_history.description: JSON string with account history and previous violations

policy_version.description: Version of suspension policy to apply

override_escalation.description: Whether to override automatic escalation rules

error_messages: Invalid violation data: violation_data must be valid JSON containing violation details.
Invalid account history: account_history must be valid JSON with historical violation data.
Policy version not found: Specified policy_version does not exist. Use 'current' or valid version identifier.
Evaluation error: Unable to process violation data. Check data format and completeness.
usage: Pass account_id with violation_data and account_history as JSON strings; optionally specify policy_version or override_escalation for special cases.

suspension_recommended.description: Whether suspension is recommended based on policy

suspension_type.description: Type of suspension: temporary, permanent, or conditional

suspension_duration_days.description: Recommended suspension duration in days (0 for permanent)

appeal_eligible.description: Whether the account is eligible for appeal process
